Package com.g1.mychess.player.service

Interface PlayerRatingHistoryService

All Known Implementing Classes:
PlayerRatingHistoryServiceImpl
public interface PlayerRatingHistoryService
Service interface for managing player rating histories. Provides methods to update, fetch, and clean up rating histories of players.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    cleanupOldRatingHistories()
    Cleans up old player rating histories that are no longer needed.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<PlayerRatingHistoryDTO>>
    getPlayerRatingHistory(Long playerId)
    Fetches the rating history of a player by their player ID.
    void
    updatePlayerRatingHistory(PlayerRatingUpdateDTO ratingUpdateDTO)
    Updates the rating history of a player.

  • Method Details

    • cleanupOldRatingHistories

      void cleanupOldRatingHistories()
      Cleans up old player rating histories that are no longer needed. This method is typically called to remove outdated rating data from the system.

    • updatePlayerRatingHistory

      void updatePlayerRatingHistory(PlayerRatingUpdateDTO ratingUpdateDTO)
      Updates the rating history of a player.
      Parameters:
      ratingUpdateDTO - the DTO containing the details of the rating update to be applied.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the rating update data is invalid or incomplete.

    • getPlayerRatingHistory

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<PlayerRatingHistoryDTO>> getPlayerRatingHistory(Long playerId)
      Fetches the rating history of a player by their player ID.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the ID of the player whose rating history is to be fetched.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of PlayerRatingHistoryDTO objects representing the player's rating history. If the player does not exist or has no rating history, an empty list is returned.
